title: ProcurementDeliveryEvent
description: Event representing a delivery of goods or services under a contract.

contractId.description: Identifier of the contract under which this delivery occurs.

lineItemId.description: Identifier of the contract line item this delivery fulfills, if applicable.

deliveredAt.description: Timestamp when the delivery occurred or was recorded.

statusCode.description: Status of the delivery (e.g., COMPLETED, PARTIAL, REJECTED).
